body:
Installing fmt 5.3.0 is failing due to the out-dated checksum:
```
==> Fetching https://github.com/fmtlib/fmt/releases/download/5.3.0/fmt-5.3.0.zip
[91m==> Error: ChecksumError: sha256 checksum failed for /usr/local/var/spack/stage/fmt-5.3.0-2gwik4qnlccthrcaqjoa6mrvq3u54vnh/fmt-5.3.0.zip
    Expected 2ba1469c1f7677e70cb32bcd7dd0907e6952e16a161f07e05c7ffa388643b607 but got 4c0741e10183f75d7d6f730b8708a99b329b2f942dad5a9da3385ab92bb4a15c
```
title: Update checksum of fmt 5.3.0
